Other retail traders started buying the position for whatever reason. They're not providing the exit liquidity for them. The market makers would be providing the exit liquidity for them. So yeah. Is what it is. But anyways, about time for me to wrap up fun conversation though about like analyzing an order and then actually talking about order flows spoofing. I think those are good concepts to be aware of. So even though they didn't directly apply here, still happy to chat about them. As always, if you need anything, let me know. Be an outlier.
